sections.summary: industrial engineer with wide experience in manufacturing, quality, material planning and inventory control. reach revenue goals through hard work and process improvement. expert in mrp ii, proficient in ms office and exact macola. bilingual english/spanish. areas of expertise material planning\mrp firm knowledge of apics concepts. inventory accuracy knowledgeable of lean manufacturing principles and the theory of constraints. manufacturing planning and control. process improvement erp systems implementation accomplishments as material planner/inventory analyst: achieved 99% inventory accuracy through weekly cycle counting and process improvement. eliminated production disruption caused by material shortage. as operations manager: improved customer service by automating quote- order entry- billing process for a small business. as project manager: reduced implementation time by 50%.
